channel.title: Wear armour when you click on something?
channel.description: Im trying to make a castlewars server. But is there a way so when I click on a item you wear auto items like the castlewars cloak? And is there a way so you can't unwear it?

item.title: Wear armour when you click on something?
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

umm im sure theres a castle wars tut in tutorial section, i saw it a while ago, its updates, you should try it out

Read full topic
